languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, еще кое-что. Конфиденциальное дело огромной важности. Госпожа Теодора..." {n}Абеляр чуть запинается.{/n} "Ваша бесконечно уважаемая предшественница... привела корабль в эту систему не просто так. Ей было дано секретное поручение. Вы, наверное, захотите спросить, кто раздает поручения самим Вольным Торговцам? Отвечу — это может делать {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитор{/g}, перст {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, главный вершитель его воли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша светлость, еще кое-что. Конфиденциальное дело огромной важности. Госпожа Теодора..." {n}Абеляр чуть запинается.{/n} "Ваша бесконечно уважаемая предшественница... привела корабль в эту систему не просто так. Ей было дано секретное поручение. Вы, наверное, захотите спросить, кто раздает поручения самим Вольным Торговцам? Отвечу — это может делать {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитор{/g}, перст {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, главный вершитель его воли в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

languages.text: “大人，还有一件事情，一件最重要的机密事项。西奥多拉夫人，她……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫片刻。{/n}“您永远可敬的前任行商浪人……她把船开到这里，来到这个星系，并非没有原因。有人给了她一份秘密委托。或许您很好奇，究竟是谁有权委任行商浪人做事？这个人便是{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}大审判官{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}之手。他负责在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}行使帝皇的意志。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “大人，还有一件事情，一件最重要的机密事项。西奥多拉夫人，她……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫片刻。{/n}“您永远可敬的前任行商浪人……她把船开到这里，来到这个星系，并非没有原因。有人给了她一份秘密委托。或许您很好奇，究竟是谁有权委任行商浪人做事？这个人便是{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判长{/g}，帝皇之{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}手{/g}。他负责在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯星域{/g}行使帝皇的意志。”

“大人，还有一件事情，一件最重要的机密事项。西奥多拉夫人，她……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫片刻。{/n}“您永远可敬的前任行商浪人……她把船开到这里，来到这个星系，并非没有原因。有人给了她一份秘密委托。或许您很好奇，究竟是谁有权委任行商浪人做事？这个人便是{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}大审判官{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}之手。他负责在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}行使帝皇的意志。”

languages.text: 「{mf|陛下|陛下}、もうひとつあります。最も重要な機密事項です。テオドラ様…」{n}アベラールはためらう。{/n}「あなたの尊敬する前任者が…この星系に船を寄越したのには 理由があるのです。彼女は秘密の任務を与えられていました。ローグトレーダーに何かを依頼する権限を持っているのか誰なのか、不思議にお想いでしょう？教えてさしあげましょう。それは、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の手、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}における皇帝の意志の最高責任者です」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

「{mf|陛下|陛下}、もうひとつあります。最も重要な機密事項です。テオドラ様…」{n}アベラールはためらう。{/n}「あなたの尊敬する前任者が…この星系に船を寄越したのには 理由があるのです。彼女は秘密の任務を与えられていました。ローグトレーダーに何かを依頼する権限を持っているのか誰なのか、不思議にお想いでしょう？教えてさしあげましょう。それは、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の手、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}における皇帝の意志の最高責任者です」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, eine Sache wäre da noch. Eine vertrauliche Angelegenheit von höchster Wichtigkeit. Lady Theodora ...!" {n}Abelard zögert.{/n} "Eure auf ewig geschätzte Vorgängerin, hatte einen Grund, das Schiff in dieses System zu bringen. Sie hatte einen Geheimauftrag. Ihr fragt Euch jetzt vielleicht, wer überhaupt die Autorität hat, einer Freihändlerin einen Auftrag zu erteilen. Ich werde es Euch sagen – der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitor{/g}, die Hand des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, der oberste Architekt Seines Willens in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

Lady Theodora ...!" {n}Abelard zögert.{/n} "Eure auf ewig geschätzte Vorgängerin, hatte einen Grund, das Schiff in dieses System zu bringen. Sie hatte einen Geheimauftrag. Ihr fragt Euch jetzt vielleicht, wer überhaupt die Autorität hat, einer Freihändlerin einen Auftrag zu erteilen. Ich werde es Euch sagen – der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitor{/g}, die Hand des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, der oberste Architekt Seines Willens in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."

"Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, eine Sache wäre da noch. Eine vertrauliche Angelegenheit von höchster Wichtigkeit. Lady Theodora ...!" {n}Abelard zögert.{/n} "Eure auf ewig geschätzte Vorgängerin, hatte einen Grund, das Schiff hierher in dieses System zu bringen. Sie hatte einen Geheimauftrag. Ihr fragt Euch jetzt vielleicht, wer überhaupt die Autorität hat, einer Freihändlerin einen Auftrag zu erteilen. Ich werde es Euch sagen – der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitor{/g}, die Hand des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, der oberste Architekt seines Willens in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, il y a autre chose. Une affaire confidentielle de la plus haute importance. Dame Théodora... » {n}Abélard hésite.{/n} « Votre éternelle et estimée prédécesseure... a amené le vaisseau jusqu'ici, dans ce système, pour une raison précise. Une mission secrète lui avait été confiée. Vous vous demandez peut-être qui a le pouvoir d'ordonner à un libre-marchande de faire quoi que ce soit. Eh bien je vais vous le dire : le {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g}, la Main de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, l'architecte principal de sa volonté dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, il y a autre chose. Une affaire confidentielle de la plus haute importance. Dame Théodora... » {n}Abélard hésite.{/n} « Votre éternelle et estimée prédécesseure... a amené le vaisseau jusqu'ici, dans ce système, pour une raison précise. Une mission secrète lui avait été confiée. Vous vous demandez peut-être qui a le pouvoir d'ordonner à un libre-marchande de faire quoi que ce soit. Eh bien je vais vous le dire : le {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Main{/g} de l'Empereur, l'architecte principal de sa volonté dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, aún hay más. Un asunto confidencial de la máxima importancia. Lady Theodora...». {n}Abelard duda.{/n} «Su eternamente estimada predecesora... trajo su nave aquí, a este sistema, por un motivo. Había recibido un encargo secreto. Seguramente se pregunte quién cuenta con la autoridad para encargarle algo personalmente a una Comerciante Independiente... Se trata del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g}, la Mano del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, el principal arquitecto de Su voluntad en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, aún hay más. Un asunto confidencial de la máxima importancia. Lady Theodora...». {n}Abelard duda.{/n} «Su eternamente estimada predecesora... trajo su nave aquí, a este sistema, por un motivo. Había recibido un encargo secreto. Seguramente se pregunte quién cuenta con la autoridad para encargarle algo personalmente a una Comerciante Independiente... Se trata del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Mano{/g} del Emperador, el principal arquitecto de Su voluntad en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir şey daha var. Son derece mühim, mahrem bir mesele. Leydi Theodora..." {n}Abelard tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Ebedî hürmete layık selefinizin... Gemiyi buraya, bu sisteme getirmesinin bir sebebi vardı. Kendisine gizli bir talimat verilmişti. Kim bir Hür Tacir'i vazifelendirme yetkisine sahip olabilir diye merak ediyorsunuzdur tabii. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} Eli, O'nun {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ndeki{/g} iradesinin baş mimarı {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu{/g} olur kendileri."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there is one other thing. A confidential matter of the utmost importance. Lady Theodora..." {n}Abelard hesitates.{/n} "Your eternally esteemed predecessor... brought the ship here, to this system, for a reason. She was given a secret commission. You perhaps are wondering who has the authority to commission a Rogue Trader to do anything? And I shall tell you — the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}, the Hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, the chief architect of His will in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."
